course.title: PSY 4371 Special Topics in Psycho- Pathology (3 units)
course.desc: The study of various themes in abnormal psychology. The content may change from year to year.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: 81 university units including PSY 1101, PSY 1102, PSY 3171. Reserved for students registered in the Major, Joint Honours and Honours programs in psychology.
